attributes.action: stop the practice of providing new identities and funding the life of criminals after their release from prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the tax payer fund the recently announced £1,000,000 new life package for Karen Matthews and those on existing schemes for people who have knowingly committed crimes putting themselves in the position they are now in. There are far better ways of spending such money.
